title: Photojournalist Rafiq Uddin Enayet dies
body: Photojournalist Rafiq Uddin Enayet died on Friday while undergoing treatment at Government Employees Hospital. Photojournalist Rasfiq, who worked for daily New Nation and news agency Banglar Chokh, was a member of the Bangladesh Photojournalists Association. Expressing deep condolences, the association said that Rafiq Uddin Enayet was associated with professional photojournalism for a long time and earned the respect of his colleagues through his honesty, dedication, and professional skills throughout his career. He is survived by his wife and a daughter, according to a press release issued by the Bangladesh Photojournalists Association.
